description: Children being sent home from school and absent tourists leave Italy reeling from coronavirus.
title: School's out: Parents stressed by Italy coronavirus shutdown
title_page: School's out: Parents stressed by Italy coronavirus shutdown - BBC News
maintext: Health, the economy, even Italians' way of life: all are now facing an unparalleled challenge. There is shock here at seeing how vulnerable this economy is to events beyond Italy's control. And for many the most damaging thing is not knowing when this uncertainty will pass.
